com.antlersoft.android.bc

接口 IBCGestureDetector

  • 所有已知实现类:
    BCGestureDetectorDefault

    public interface IBCGestureDetector
    Create a gesture detector in a version friendly way, avoiding incompatible API on older version and deprecated API on newer version
    作者:
    Michael A. MacDonald
